stories.title: Creation of the World
stories.content: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth...

stories.title: Noah's Ark
stories.content: God instructed Noah to build an ark and bring two of every kind of animal...

stories.title: The Ten Commandments
stories.content: And God spoke all these words: 'I am the Lord your God, who brought you out of Egypt...'

stories.title: David and Goliath
stories.content: The Philistine giant Goliath challenged the Israelites, but the young shepherd David defeated him with a sling and a stone...

stories.title: The Birth of Jesus
stories.content: In those days, Caesar Augustus issued a decree that a census should be taken of the entire Roman world...

stories.title: The Good Samaritan
stories.content: A man was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho when he was attacked by robbers. A priest and a Levite passed by, but a Samaritan helped him...

stories.title: Moses and the Burning Bush
stories.content: Moses was tending the flock of Jethro when he saw a burning bush. God spoke to him and revealed His name...

stories.title: The Prodigal Son
stories.content: A man had two sons. The younger one asked for his share of the inheritance, wasted it, and returned home repentant...

stories.title: The Exodus
stories.content: God brought the Israelites out of Egypt with signs and wonders, and they celebrated the Passover...

stories.title: The Sermon on the Mount
stories.content: Jesus delivered the Beatitudes and other teachings on a mountainside, emphasizing love, humility, and righteousness...

stories.title: The Feeding of the 5,000
stories.content: Jesus fed a large crowd with five loaves and two fish, demonstrating His miraculous power...

stories.title: Daniel in the Lion's Den
stories.content: Daniel, a faithful servant of God, was thrown into a den of lions but was protected by God's angels...

stories.title: Jonah and the Big Fish
stories.content: God called Jonah to go to Nineveh, but he tried to escape. A big fish swallowed him, and he prayed for deliverance...

stories.title: The Transfiguration
stories.content: Jesus took Peter, James, and John up a mountain, where He was transfigured before them, revealing His divine glory...

stories.title: Raising Lazarus from the Dead
stories.content: Jesus raised Lazarus, who had been dead for four days, demonstrating His power over death...

stories.title: The Healing of the Blind Man
stories.content: Jesus healed a man born blind, revealing Himself as the light of the world...

stories.title: The Last Supper
stories.content: Jesus shared a Passover meal with His disciples, instituting the Lord's Supper and predicting His betrayal...

stories.title: The Crucifixion
stories.content: Jesus was crucified on the cross, bearing the sins of humanity and offering salvation to all who believe...

stories.title: The Resurrection
stories.content: On the third day, Jesus rose from the dead, defeating sin and death and bringing hope to the world...
